article_title: Chesapeake city planner to run against U.S. Rep. Bobby Scott
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , 4th congressional district, chesapeake planning commission, marty williams, bobby scott, republican, democrat, 2016 election, virginia
article_metadata.author: Bill Bartel

og.description: Marty Williams, a retired Chesapeake police sergeant who chairs the city's Planning Commission, said Friday he's running for Congress this year against incumbent U.S. Rep. Bobby Scott.
